name: Worm Hero
description:
This game was made for a local game Jam in my city. The theme was changing the gender of a classic game. We decided to use worms.

This was made by three people:

Andres Ocampo: Visual Art
Francisco Maldonado: Music
Azagaya (me): Programming

It is the first game we made! None of us had made a game before.

Controls:

A: Move left
D: Move Right
SPC: Jump
S + SPC: Fall through platform
SPC while on aire: Parachute (needs item)
Left click: Shoot
Right click while standing still: Aim

Weapons:

Uzi and Shotgun: shoots forward when jumping or moving. Shoots everywhere while aiming.
Bazooka: can only shoot while aiming. Hold left click to charge, release it to shoot.
